Description.Text: The Wyndham Garden Chelsea Hotel is a 17 story 124 room hotel is nestled in the heart of Manhattan's beloved Midtown area. It's more than just location- it's a whole new vision in hospitality. Everyone will find wonderfully inviting bedding, and the comforts of many of Manhattan's elite priced hotels in this gem of a find. This hotel will lavish everyone with the comfort and superior guest service. This hotel has an aggressive green initiative in place in every area of the hotel.

Arts & Cultural: • Metropolitan Museum of Art • Museum of Modern Art (MoMa) • Museum of Natural History • Museum of the City of New York
Points of Interest: • Empire State Building • Flatiron Building • NYC Seminar and Conference Center • Statue of Liberty • Times Square
Shopping: • Century 21 • Saks • Lord & Taylor
Sports & Amusement: • Giants Stadium • Madison Square Garden • Shea Stadium • Yankee Stadium

This newly constructed property was just completed in November 2008. And all 124 rooms offer the relaxing calm and 100% cotton Wyndham BeWellSM bedding. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access, 32" flat screen TVs, and alarm clocks with MP3 capability means that hotel is not only surrounded by comfort but also with the latest in technology. Every bathroom has a granite countertop and Kohler hardware. With only 8 rooms per floor, this property has the intimate ambiance of a cozy boutique hotel.

This 100% smoke-free property is brand new and only just opened in late 2008. The exterior is clad in colorful tile and boasts two modern metal pergolas. Complimentary High Speed Internet along with 24 hour fitness center and business services. For security, each room comes equipped with laptop sized safes, and state of the art fire safety equipment. This Hotel is on 5th Avenue, neighboring the famous 5th Avenue shopping area of Sak's 5th Avenue, Lord and Taylor, Bloomingdales and many others. Also It is blocks away from Madison Square Garden, home of the New York Knicks, New York Rangers, and New York's most famous events, Also the world department store is right across the street from MSG.

• Tribecca Film Festival - April & May The Festival's program lineup offers moviegoers a wide variety of independent films, including documentaries, narrative features and shorts, as well as a program of family-friendly films. • New York International Auto Show - April The New York International Auto Show is an annual auto show held in New York City at the Jacob Javits Convention Center. • NYC Pridefest - June PrideFest is the annual LGBT street fair. PrideFest seeks to bring together local residents and families, community leaders, and area business owners to celebrate in the street. • NYC Big Apple Barbeque - June The weekend-long event takes place every June and brings together the country's top pitmasters, who cook up their award-winning food for more than 100,000 barbecue enthusiasts. • Fashion Week - September New York Fashion Week moves to Damrosch Park at the Lincoln Center complex, home to the reknowned Metropolitan Opera house and American Ballet Theatre.
Advance deposits are accepted, not required. Reservation must be canceled by 6pm day prior to arrival to avoid cancellation fee equal to one night's room and tax.

From LGA - La Guardia Airport Distance : 7 miles Directions Exit airport to Grand Central West to the BQE towards Queens to 495 West to Midtown tunnel to 33rd Street West to 7th Avenue to 24th Street, turn left on 24th Street, hotel is located on left between 5th and 6th Avenues.
From JFK - John F. Kennedy International Airport Distance : 12 miles Directions Exit airport follow signs to VanWyck Expressway to Grand Central West to the LIE (Long Island Expressway) to 495 west to Midtown tunnel to 33rd Street west to 7th Avenue to 24th Street, turn left on 24th Street, hotel is located on left between 5th and 6th Avenues.

• San Rocco: On-site modern and trendy Italian restaurant serving breakfast, lunch, and dinner. • BLT Prime: Discover BLT Prime in Manhattan's enchanting Gramercy Park neighborhood, and unwind and dine in a comfy yet modern suede banquette on the first floor or overlook the handsome dining room from the mezzanine. • Eleven Madison Park: Set in a magnificent Art Deco dining room with soaring ceilings and lush views of historic Madison Square Park, Eleven Madison Park is an elegant restaurant serving Chef Daniel Humm's modern, pure and market-driven French cuisine. • Markt: Markt is a precise and detailed recreation of a classic Belgian brasserie right in the heart of New York's Chelsea district. • Metro Café & Wine Bar: With the selection and swank of a trendy lounge, but the mellow attitude and low prices of a neighborhood bar, this spot is ideal for winding down after work with friends or for a not-too-pricey date.
A great place to launch your fabulous vacation; the Wyndham Garden Hotel Chelsea provides guests with the ultimate experience
